Sonam Kapoor's Heartfelt Birthday Post For Brother Harshvardhan Will Warm The Cockles Of Your Heart!
Sonam Kapoor's Heartfelt Birthday Post For Brother Harshvardhan Will Warm The Cockles Of Your Heart!
There is nothing in this world that can be as special as sibling love. It's like you have someone who will always be on your team and will fight and stand up for you during testing times. In Bollywood, we see this warm sibling bond between the Kapoor siblings.
Sonam, Harshvardhan and Rhea Kapoor are siblings who have time and again made us miss our family! The way these three bond and are there for each other is #goals and maybe more than that.
Today on Harshvardhan Kapoor's birthday, both Rhea and Sonam are extending their heartfelt wishes. The Kapoors are currently holidaying in London and celebrations are on for the siblings!
Instagram
Sonam Kapoor took to Instagram to share an adorable throwback picture from her wedding. She captioned the picture as:
"Happy happy birthday my baby brother. You have no idea how much you’re loved and adored.. keep working hard and keep striving forward and the world will see what a special person you are! @harshvardhankapoor."
